gen:link.msg:message: `AssetsCurrent` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_AssetsCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_AssetsCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsCurrentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AssetsNoncurrent` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_AssetsNoncurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_AssetsNoncurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAssetsNoncurrentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAssetsNoncurrentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAssetsNoncurrentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentDebit1_ChildrenOfAssetsNoncurrentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`EquityGroup` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit1_EquityGroup')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit1_EquityGroup return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquityGroupCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquityGroupCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquityGroupDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenDParentCredit1_ChildrenOfEquityGroupDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`OutcomeAssetsCurrentLessLiabilitiesCurrent` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan + `AssetsCurrent` - `LiabilitiesCurrent`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST102Variables1_OutcomeAssetsCurrentLessLiabilitiesCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST102Variables1_OutcomeAssetsCurrentLessLiabilitiesCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST102Variables1_AssetsCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST102Variables1_AssetsCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST102Variables1_LiabilitiesCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST102Variables1_LiabilitiesCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`OutcomeAssetsLessLiabilitiesCurrent` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan + `AssetsNoncurrent` + `AssetsCurrent` - `LiabilitiesCurrent`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST103Variables1_OutcomeAssetsLessLiabilitiesCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST103Variables1_OutcomeAssetsLessLiabilitiesCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST103Variables1_AssetsNoncurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST103Variables1_AssetsNoncurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST103Variables1_AssetsCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST103Variables1_AssetsCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST103Variables1_LiabilitiesCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedBalanceSheetVertical_PrtFST103Variables1_LiabilitiesCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
